tax_year.desc: Tax year for this Notice of Assessment

15000.desc: Line 15000 - Total income from all sources

deductions_from_total_income.desc: Total deductions claimed from total income (RRSP, union dues, childcare, etc.)

23600.desc: Line 23600 - Net income (total income minus deductions)

26000.desc: Line 26000 - Taxable income (net income minus additional deductions)

35000.desc: Line 35000 - Total federal non-refundable tax credits

61500.desc: Line 61500 - Total provincial/territorial non-refundable tax credits

43500.desc: Line 43500 - Total payable (total tax owed before credits/payments)

43700.desc: Line 43700 - Total income tax deducted (from T4s, T5s, etc.)

48600.desc: Line 48600 - Payment on filing (amount paid when filing return)

48200.desc: Line 48200 - Total credits (refundable tax credits like GST/HST credit)

penalties.desc: Late filing or other penalties charged

balance_from_assessment.desc: Balance resulting from this assessment (before interest/penalties)

balance_due.desc: Final balance due (positive = owes CRA, negative = refund)

balance_indicator.desc: Whether balance is DR (debit/owes) or CR (credit/refund)

rrsp_deduction_limit.desc: RRSP deduction limit for the following year
